metadata.title: Under Armour Women's ColdGear Infrared Softershell
features: UA Storm 2: Highly Water Resistant & Windproof
ColdGear Infrared lining uses a soft, thermo conductive inner coating to absorb & retain body heat
Soft, brushed interior locks in heat for all day warmth & comfort
Rolled forward shoulder seams to help reduce chafing & pressure points
description: UA Storm 2: Highly Water-Resistant & Windproof .ColdGear Infrared lining uses a soft, thermo-conductive inner coating to absorb & retain body heat .Slick bonded 3-layer fleece construction .Soft, brushed interior locks in heat for all-day warmth & comfort .Rolled forward shoulder seams to help reduce chafing & pressure points .Built-in ColdGear cuffs to help seal in body heat .UA MagZip magnetic quick zip for extra easy on/off .Princess seams for a more streamlined fit .Secure zip hand pockets .
